items.content_html: Rivulex NestJS is a wrapper over Rivulex, a lightweight message broker using Redis Streams. It offers easy plug-in abstractions for NestJS, including a custom transport layer for event-driven communication, publisher, and event trimming, ensuring reliable, at-least-once message delivery.
items.title: raw-leak/nestjs-rivulex: Rivulex NestJS is a wrapper over Rivulex, a lightweight message broker using Redis Streams. It offers easy plug-in abstractions for NestJS, including a custom transport layer for event-driven communication, publisher, and event trimming, ensuring reliable, at-least-once message delivery.
